selectSql:
select 
	lc.id,
	lc.qtdeconomia,
	lc.idcategoria,
	lc.idligacao,
	lc.idsubcategoria 
from public.ligacaocategoria lc
join (
	select
		*,
		ctid,
		row_number() over (partition by idclienteinquilino
	order by
		id) as idci,
		row_number() over (partition by idmedidor
	order by
		id) as idm
	from
		ligacao l) l on (l.id = lc.idligacao)
	where
	l.idci = 1
	and l.idm = 1
insertSql:
insert into ${SCHEMA}.ligacao_categoria
    (id,
	quantidade_economias,
	id_categoria,
	id_ligacao_imovel,
	id_subcategoria)
